title: Sync Creatives Async Response - Working
description: Structure of parts.data in webhook payloads for sync_creatives when status is 'working'. Used within A2A StreamResponse statusUpdate.message.parts[].data (DataPart data field). This status indicates that the creative sync operation is actively processing (uploading assets, validating formats, processing generative creatives). creative_ids is required for identifying which creatives are being processed.

creative_ids.description: Array of creative IDs being processed. Required for identifying which creatives are being synced.

context.description: Application-level context echoed from the request. Opaque correlation data for internal tracking.

examples.description: Working status with creative_ids for tracking
